aircraft.value: Goliath Lift - AC-4506-694 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Fuselage skin crack propagation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 21/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 27/11/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 28/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
